text: Real Experts. Real Trades. Real Profits  Good afternoon. If you missed today’s Facebook LIVE I announced starting a new curriculum for the $2,000 Small Account Journey service. I will create a Google document organizing all the new video lessons. 100% of them will be on Facebook. Here’s the 4 I did today. Opening a trade: Closing a trade: My goal is to address any of your questions so if you post something under any of these videos I will attempt to answer it in future videos. [Last night’s email summarizing the week if you missed it] I’ve been teaching subscribers my options trading blueprint for small accounts. This week I went 7 for 7 in Journey. All trades alerted to subscribers’ smartphones before entry and exit. +38% +$590 on COST +21% +$330 on TSLA +24% +$615 on TSLA +31% +$872 on NVDA +27% +$510 on NVDA +5% +$135 on TSLA +29% +$780 on TSLA My results aren’t typical. I’ve been working very hard at this. And I’m happy to teach you. The $2,000 balance is now up to $14,729 or 636% since November 13. Winning 49 out of 55 trade alerts. What a few subscribers had to say in chat as we closed Friday’s session. You’ll know within a week if you love it or not. I’m teaching the $2,000 Small Account Journey blueprint this Saturday and Sunday morning at 11 AM ET. Both sessions will be LIVE on my Facebook. Don’t worry, I’ll send you a reminder each morning. Eat, sleep & trade!
